name: Hack the Core
description:
The Planet Xirian...
in the Year 5000...
A group of terrorists threatens to blow up the Central Unit containing an AI in charge of Orobis City's protection.
Since you're a citizen of Orobis, and an outstanding hacker, you have given yourself the mission to stop them.
Your mission: Dive into the VR and hack the Core connected to the bombs before they explode. If you fail, the terrorists will take control of the city.
Good luck!

On fiction-interactive.fr, a "Sprint" was made.
The goal was to write a 500 words story in 1 weekend.
The theme was “pirate/hacker”.
Here's my participation, on Steam!Features
  • a 500 Words Interactive Fiction
  • with Steam Achievements
The default & original language of the game is French.
To toggle English, go the Préférences and select English.
